title: High memory usage and out of memory crashes when building many projects in one invocation
body:
We are building 521 projects in single `dotnet msbuild` invocation resulting in out of memory crash on machine with 8gb memory and 16gb of swap. Worker processes continuously grow in size and using `UnloadProjectsOnCompletion` on inner msbuild invocation doesn't help either.

![](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/174281/23783842/51566754-0513-11e7-8fd1-b47c1821bf66.png)

Can be reproduced by cloning `git@github.com:aspnet/Universe.git` commit `90922646bf422547d110376481d5d1f309fb0e37` and running `.\build.cmd`


Sample crash logs:
